prompt: Build an About Us page with a warm beige background and a centered logo at the top using a rounded square icon with a red accent. Display the company name 'InnovateTech' in bold, dark red text. Include a company description in a centered paragraph with dark brown text. Feature an 'Our Team' section with three team member cards arranged in a horizontal row, each with a rounded square avatar, name, and job title in a warm color palette. Add a contact section at the bottom in a white container with a subtle red border. Use a Column layout with 20px padding and spacing, and a warm red-brown color scheme.
